Room.Name: Hafnia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a short road called Hafnia Way between Golden Dolphin Way on the south, and Waterfront Way on the north.
Room.LongDescription: A short way to the north, on the east side of Hania Way, is a large vacant area that was once part of the DeNail corn field, but is now used by merchants to assemble caravans to take supplies out of the city. A camel lot creates quite a smell. There are a number of brightly colored tents there, with banners snapping in the breeze.
